lenders.name: Sara

lenders.name: Brock
lenders.loan_because: it is a brilliant concept: a micro-loan. I have been searching for a better, rational charity to give to for many years. But unlike traditional charity, these contributions give incentive for individuals to work, to innovate, and to spread capitalism all over the world. Capitalism is the only hope for ending worldwide, extreme poverty.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.occupation: Executive Director of a small charity

lenders.name: katie

lenders.name: rick
lenders.loan_because:
UPDATE AUGUST 2013

As a direct result of Kiva's partnership with Kenya's Strathmore University (OPUS DEI), I've decided that it is time for me to leave Kiva. 

I've stopped funding loans, and will withdraw my funds (unfortunately, some of them won't be paid out for several years).

There are many other worthy micro-lending sites out there - perhaps our paths will cross on one or more of them.
==========
I learned about Kiva through Toronto Star newspaper article in August, 2008.

I joined Kiva a few minutes after reading it and understanding the positive impact micro-loans can have on people's lives.

The money I used to spend supporting a 2-cup-a-day coffee habit is now directed to Kiva and other charitable causes.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm an Information Coordinator in procurement.

I answer questions and provide information about our procurement efforts to the general public, other government ministries and agencies, and suppliers who want to provide services to the government.

lenders.name: Nellie and Corné
lenders.loan_because: we can really help/support  people to build up a better live for themselves and their family with lending money. We really like the idea behing KIVA.ORG, and also the possibility to spread the loans over multiple projects across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Nellie worked as a nurse in our local hospital, Corné  works as a project manager with a bank.

lenders.name: Katja
lenders.loan_because: it´s a perfect idea: you help, you get back your money and you help again.

lenders.name: Richard & Marina
lenders.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just caring people who want to help others.

lenders.name: Cornelia
lenders.loan_because: We are all neighbours on this planet.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women succeed! I am inspired by women who are motivated to change their lives for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that imports wines from around the world.

lenders.name: Rosemary
lenders.loan_because: I want to offer others the opportunity to fulfill their dreams and live a better life.  We have so much abundance we need to share it with others !
lenders.occupational_info: I manage marketing programs for a high tech computer company.

lenders.name: Muhammad
lenders.occupational_info: My name is Muhammad,I come from a big family of 11 kids.  I was born in Kabul, Afghanistan. We became refugees when Afghanistan's war started.  We have been Pakistan refugees since I was 12 years old.  In the past I have worked as a teacher, cleaner,and taught internet to people in school. In Pakistan it is hard to find good jobs unless one has money, and being a refugee makes it harder yet. I want to start a business so I can help my family be happy and one day go to Canada to marry the woman who as help me get to this site. I will work very hard to get to my dream life.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.occupational_info: I am disabled but have a mind and heart for giving. People tend to see my wheelchair first then me. I am real, I am human, I am a loving person, Help me and I'll help you. We need to help others to help ourselves.

lenders.name: Meryl
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently studying biology at Hunter College in New York City

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupation: I work as a Police Dispatcher.
lenders.loan_because: I have been to countries where people need the help of others; and it is such a simple thing to do to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a police dispatcher, I answer phone calls and radio traffic to get the officers to the locations where they are needed. I also support the officer when they are on scene with information.

lenders.name: Joann
lenders.loan_because: The people profiles take me back to when I traveled the world and realized even a small amount of money could improve a person's life. Because of family obligations, I no longer travel but Kiva allows me to still connect with people in developing nations and impact their lives in a positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: I write travel articles, juvenile biographies, and women's fiction. `

lenders.name: Cissy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give motivated people a chance to improve their quality of life.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I believe the poor are victims of environment that are as capable and hardworking as anyone else
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in the process of selling and buying large underground pools of petroleum.

lenders.name: noah
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is all our responsibility to help as many others help themselves as we are financially able to and i see this as that oppertunity.
lenders.occupational_info: we buy commercial properties in east texas and lease them to large corperations for a 3 to 10 year period.if there are not buildings on the properties when we purchase them we will construct a building to suit there needs.

lenders.name: Hiren Patel
lenders.occupation: Teacher/Getter of Objects off high shelves
lenders.loan_because: nothing makes you feel better than by spreading good around.
lenders.occupational_info:
-Trying to get kids to see why fractions and percents are so important when going shopping
- Listening to endless requests to get a drink or visit a locker
- Explaining that a presentation involving reading your paper is not usually a good idea
- Teaching the importance of being a good citizen, environmentally and socially 
-Watching for when the light bulb goes on --- that's partly what makes it so worthwhile

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: all im giving up is a number on a bank statement, why wouldn't I?
lenders.occupational_info: i go to school, wooh

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We are family

lenders.name: vinodh
lenders.loan_because: I learned about Kiva through a magazine article and impressed about their work.I like to hear stories from these entrepreneurs.This is an opportunity to learn a new business model and make a global impact.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I know we live in a world of abundance. It is time for everyone to wake up and act that way.  A decent lifestyle is the birthright of every human on Earth.

lenders.name: Terri Winn
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  I love the concept of a perpetual loan.  Teaching my young boys how to make a difference in someone's life has huge value.
lenders.occupational_info: Represent buyer's and seller's of real estate in San Luis Obispo county, California.

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: as a Christian, I want to give back some of the many blessings that Christ has bestowed upon me
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick patients in the Emergency Department

lenders.name: tiny*prints
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, and because many people took a chance on me early in my life that led to my own success.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur - I know how hard you all work.

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because: It's a hand-up.
lenders.occupational_info: I help developmentally disabled adults live fun and interesting independent lives!

lenders.name: Liu
lenders.loan_because: it can help to ease hardship.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: people need help and I am able to help them.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves to dream big... and I would love to help make those dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company buys homes that are in bad condition. We fix them up and sell them to new families.

lenders.name: Coach Chris
lenders.loan_because: It makes a differance in another mother or fathers life.
lenders.occupational_info: I put father of two because I work to support 4 people.  My daughter, my son, my wife and myself.  I would do anything it takes to make sure my family lives.  Today, I manager a service company for a local fitness equipment retail store.

lenders.name: Fanny
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good way to help people. Sustainable business is the key to success ! According to me, the implication of the business owner is mandatory in order to achieve this success. Wanting to pay back the funds they raised is a proof of good-will.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies to improve the relationship they have with their clients.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: We are a youth group of 12 members and we are involved in social entrepreneurship work. Where we make a moringa oleifera enriched porridge flour to support PLWAH and orphans in schools around the community. We alo supply NGO's like HelpAge Kenya and sell the products in supermarkets to raise income for the running of the enterprise.

lenders.name: MICHELLE CHAPPELL
lenders.loan_because: What a great opportunity to give someone a step up in their business and a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for our family of five we have three children aged 5, 13 and 18 years.  I work in Administration 5 days per week and my husband and I also run a  business from home, providing a fencing service in the northern metro areas of Perth, WA.  We understand the difficulty in getting a business off the ground and making it successful and the intial funding plays a huge part in that.  We hope that our donation can make a difference.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for remote access (you work on one computer while sitting at another computer)

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I care about other people and how they live!

lenders.name: Harald
lenders.loan_because: I care and i really believe in this type of loans. It's absolutely fantastic that we can help people around the globe fighting poverty, with just a little financial input. Helping people setting up their own business so they can take care of themselve and their loved ones, is something we all should do!

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I'm passionate about small business and the entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: Roy & Kuyo
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is good karma
lenders.occupational_info: Roy works in Healthcare education and Kuyo works with special needs kids

lenders.name: Luis Sanz Arilla
lenders.loan_because: We all need support when we start

lenders.name: Katiyar Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe that life's worth is gauged by the purposes it has been lived for.

lenders.name: Ari
lenders.loan_because: God tells me to.
lenders.occupational_info: Treat others as you would like to be treated.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to help people build a sustainable business in their community. I have visited cambodia, laos and bosnia and admire how people overcome adversity through hard work and kiva is a way I can support in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in local government as an executive manager of finance and corporate services

lenders.name: Sharad
lenders.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur  myself I can relate to the satisfaction that can be achieved by Kiva borrowers when starting a enterprise - however small - from the ground up
lenders.occupational_info: Development and Distribution of hi-tech electronic brand - Merlin

lenders.name: Clarice
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a special education teacher for students with Autism.

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to get something going.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great model for helping people do what they should be doing: living with dignity and with the promise of a better future for themselves and their children.

lenders.name: Big Dee
lenders.loan_because: I hope my loan can help someone earn themselves a better standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Theroretical Physicist at the CERN Laboratory on the Franco-Swiss border near Geneva. Then again I could have such a mind numbing boring and uninteresting job that I couldn't possible mention it on here :)

lenders.name: Sabine
lenders.loan_because: I think, this is the right way to really help eachother and to go forward for or better and healthy world. I am really happy to help via Kiva.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: anyone trying to improve their lot in life by working hard and striving to be a better person deserves a chance to succeed in achieving their goal.

lenders.name: Sidse
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way to help third world countries and its citizens out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, build and update websites for various companies.

lenders.name: pablo
lenders.loan_because: I belive that other people deserve better future

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: I can afford it (!) and hope it will help people who truly have these basic needs to fulfill others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of helping mills to raise their efficiency.

lenders.name: Chia-Hung
lenders.loan_because: I want to have more positive impacts on societies.
lenders.occupational_info: Graduate student studying biochemistry.

lenders.name: Oluwasegun
lenders.occupational_info: great... I want to get more money so that i can make the deram of a farmer work out

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give someone a hand!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a family -- two kids and husband and we own an auto parts business.  We also grow fruit and vegetables and enjoy sharing our produce every summer and fall.

lenders.name: Gray
lenders.loan_because: Small businesses are the foundation of a good community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design buildings that benefit communities.

lenders.name: Brian and Nicole
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to help out people around the world to get on their feet financially. We travel regularly and see the need around the world. This is another way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Brian helps people resolve conflicts arising from the end of a marriage or relationship. Nicole ensures the safety and comfort of passengers on commercial flights.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: it seems the right thing to do, as I have so much
lenders.occupational_info: trader

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: Received a gift certificate and thought to myself: what a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I research and teach on the impacts of climate change on agriculture, looking for ways to forecast and adapt.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: From a single acorn grows a mighty oak. What better way to help people than to facilitate them helping themselves.

lenders.name: Anna SystemA
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel happy and useful

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: making a difference in someone else's life isn't a difficult thing to accomplish.  I enjoy being able to help out in whatever way I can, and am always looking for innovative ways to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with autistic children at a local school specializing in educational and developmental programs for children with autism.  I also volunteer in my community as often as possible through Alpha Phi Omega, a co-ed service based Fraternity that has a chapter at my college campus.

lenders.name: FSA Foundation
lenders.loan_because: The Foundation for Socioeconomic Advancement sponsors programs to support entrepreneurship, business management, and education in developing nations, particularly the Philippines
lenders.occupational_info: A personal foundation, charged with finding unique ways for advancing the socioeconomic development of the Philippines and other regions.

lenders.name: David and Maryanne
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate and admire those who have their own businesses, and know how hard it can be to get started.  If we can offer a little help, it makes our lives better also.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer and I continue to want to make a differance in the world.

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful feeling to be able to help others who are in need.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: I have have interacted with and know people whose lives could be changed through micro-lending. I do it for the glory of God.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with youth in the Presbyterian Church to cultivate mature faith and love for God.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupation: Student, website manager, and office clerk

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.occupational_info: American student living in the UK with her parents.  Learning about business, saving, and giving.

lenders.name: Nicoletta
lenders.loan_because: It make sense!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help people. I admire the incredible risk these entrepreneurs take to provide a better life for themselves and their families. I see genuine goals in these entrepreneurs' statements and am so happy that I can help make a difference in their lives. 

"Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were." David Rockefeller (1915 - )
lenders.occupational_info: My goal is to provide legal services to entrepreneurs and businesses of all kinds, from small start-ups to established entities.

lenders.name: Farial
lenders.loan_because: there is no reason not to.

lenders.name: Marta Gómez
lenders.loan_because: Hay que ayudar, hay que dar el empujoncito, para que el ser humano tire p'alante.

lenders.name: Rocco
lenders.loan_because: I want to grow up in a slighty better world

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I don't believe in donating money to a cause, because I think that if people work hard they should be able to pull themselves up.  KIVA helps people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I consider myself a "poor college student", but as I've seen in my limited worldly travels, a "poor college student" lives like a king in many countries.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: dollars make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I write a blog about books so I can lend dollars to make a difference.

lenders.name: Nick and Sheila
lenders.loan_because: hey... why not.

lenders.name: Merrick Family
lenders.loan_because: We just want to try to help people get a little further ahead and be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in computers and at schools.  Our children are still in school.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: Sharing  is the first step to a better life
lenders.occupational_info: We own a small Jam and Jelly business.

lenders.name: Darlene
lenders.loan_because:
I feel blessed to be able to help others..I have been a Mentor to many children locally and now would like to help in other countries.
I want to give back for what has been given me and make a better life for others...
lenders.occupational_info: Retired..live in small rural farming community..

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I think third world countries need help thriving.
lenders.occupational_info: Igo to school most of the year.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I CAN help to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Paris Morris
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want people to have a better life, and enjoy life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm 10 years old and I own a little friendship bracelet business with my friend Nicole, and I wrote some books with my Dad that he published.

lenders.name: Christina Marie
lenders.loan_because: i love people

lenders.name: Umar
lenders.loan_because: It puts the 'power' in empowerment. The rise from poverty is most exciting and rewarding event anyone can ever experience.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an emergency medicine physician, taking care of the acutely ill and injured. I use lifesaving procedures to help revive and sustain severely injured persons, as well as providing interim care to persons when their usual physician is unavailable.

lenders.name: Macarena
lenders.loan_because: I think we can all really make a huge impact
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and work too

lenders.name: Marlene & Barry
lenders.loan_because: We need to share our good fortune
lenders.occupational_info: Retired, comfortanble and fortunate.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others to help themselves.  My daughter recommended KIVA. It's been a great experience.
lenders.occupational_info: Professional who takes care of other people.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: a small amount of money can make a large impact on a persons life and an entire community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working with the MFI, Manuela Ramos, in Puno, Peru, to assist in posting journal entries and other projects related to Kiva.

lenders.name: Chanda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit of every man, woman, and child.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Jesus Christ is first and foremost my Lord and Savior.  All that I do is because of him and him alone.  I believe in small business as a means of diversity in the world market.  Capitalism and freedom of the public market to operate should always be encouraged.

lenders.name: Lisa-Helene
lenders.loan_because: kiva is power and grace working together.
lenders.occupational_info: creating opportunities for : Justice

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help people to succeed in their ambitions and goals, allowing an improved standard of living and personal fulfilment.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: There is no better way that I have found to witness, feel a part of, and contribute to the interconnectedness of the people who live on this planet of ours.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to pass up 1% interest on $500.  Like almost any professional in the developed world can.
lenders.occupational_info: I market and sell solar systems to homeowners in the United States, Europe and Australia.
